allow: Bash(# Find all database files find /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system -name ""*.db"" -type f)
Bash(# Check for any existing sector/industry reference data find /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system -name ""*.json"" -o -name ""*.csv"" | xargs grep -l -i ""sector\\|industry"")

Bash(# Check for specific tables mentioned in punchlist echo ""=== Checking specific tables ==="" echo ""evolution_checkpoints:"" sqlite3 /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/db/research.db ""SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM evolution_checkpoints;"" || echo ""NOT FOUND"" echo ""discovered_strategies:"" sqlite3 /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/db/research.db ""SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM discovered_strategies;"" || echo ""NOT FOUND"" echo ""ga_evolution_history \(or evolution_history\):"" sqlite3 /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/db/research.db ""SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM evolution_history;"" || echo ""NOT FOUND"" echo ""active_evolved_strategies in performance.db:"" sqlite3 /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/db/performance.db "".tables"")
Bash(# Check orchestrator for maintenance tasks and find db_manager grep -n ""maintenance\\|cleanup\\|clean_"" /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/orchestration/orchestrator.py)

Bash(# Check if research log exists ls -la /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/logs/research.log || echo ""No research.log"" # Check where research output is going grep -l ""\\[.*\\/.*\\]"" /Volumes/HotStorage/Pi/TradeBot/trading_system/logs/*.log)
Bash("SELECT run_id, strategies_evolved, status, total_generations FROM ga_runs ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(# Check if process is stuck lsof -p 4359)
Bash(# Check for any stderr output ls -la /tmp/*.err || echo ""No error files"" # Check process threads ps -M 4359)
